summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessement roll of Local Improvement District No. 6239 for the improvement of The Playfield known as Soundview Playfield, as established by Ordinance No. 82669, situated west of 15th Ave. Northwest and north of west 90th Street; and certain streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 89726, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
